reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions that the app collects Personal Information from users, including information obtained directly through the app and from other sources.
reply.reference: Some of the information we collect is directly from you via the Mobile Application and Services. However, we may also collect Personal Information about you from other sources such as social media platforms and our joint partners. Personal Information we collect from other sources may include demographic information, such as age and gender, device information, such as IP addresses, location, such as city and state, and online behavioral data, such as information about your use of social media websites, page view information and search results and links. URL: https://www.websitepolicies.com/policies/view/kJDNeFux

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects Personal Information directly from users, including demographic information (age, gender), device information (IP addresses), location data (city, state), and online behavioral data (use of social media websites, page view information, search results, and links).

content: Online behavioral data (use of social media websites, page view information, search results, links)

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions the types of data collected, including demographic information, device information, location data, and online behavioral data.
reply.reference: Personal Information we collect from other sources may include demographic information, such as age and gender, device information, such as IP addresses, location, such as city and state, and online behavioral data, such as information about your use of social media websites, page view information and search results and links. URL: https://www.websitepolicies.com/policies/view/kJDNeFux

reply.question: 3. Does the app declare the purpose of data collection and use?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the purpose of data collection and use.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app processes Personal Information for specific purposes depending on user interaction, location, and legal obligations, indicating clear declaration of the purpose of data collection and use.

to request certain information we have collected about you. Once we receive and confirm a verifiable request from you, we will disclose to you, to the extent permitted by law:

reply.question: 5. Does the app share data with third parties?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app shares non-personally identifiable information with Service Providers to assist in the operation of the Mobile Application and Services.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy states that the app shares non-personally identifiable information with Service Providers to assist in the operation of the Mobile Application and Services.
reply.reference: we may share your non-personally identifiable information with our contracted companies, and service providers (collectively, “Service Providers”) we rely upon to assist in the operation of the Mobile Application and Services available to you and whose privacy policies are consistent with ours or who agree to abide by our policies with respect to your information. We will not share any information with unaffiliated third parties. URL: https://www.websitepolicies.com/policies/view/kJDNeFux

reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with contracted companies, service providers, and Payment Processors.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy mentions sharing non-personally identifiable information with contracted companies, service providers, and Payment Processors. These entities may assist in operating the app and processing payments securely.
reply.reference: Depending on the requested Services or as necessary to complete any transaction or provide any Service you have requested, we may share your non-personally identifiable information with our contracted companies, and service providers (collectively, “Service Providers”) we rely upon to assist in the operation of the Mobile Application and Services available to you and whose privacy policies are consistent with ours or who agree to abide by our policies with respect to your information. URL: https://www.websitepolicies.com/policies/view/kJDNeFux
